meanings.definition: Software that is available for use at no cost.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded some freeware to edit my photos.
meanings.sent2: Freeware like this helps people who can't afford expensive software.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that he found a magical freeware that fixes all computer problems.
meanings.sent4: Using freeware is like getting a free pass to the world of technology.
meanings.sent5: The freeware was like a treasure chest full of useful tools.

meanings.definition: A program or application that can be downloaded and used without payment.
meanings.sent1: She found a great freeware for organizing her schedule.
meanings.sent2: Freeware allows people to access useful tools without spending money.
meanings.sent3: I discovered a freeware that claims to make you a better cook just by downloading it.
meanings.sent4: The freeware was a lifesaver for students who couldn't afford expensive software.
meanings.sent5: Downloading the freeware felt like unwrapping a gift of endless possibilities.
